name: Bigface Marsh
description:
You lost a bet and now you have been sent to the swamp to obtain footage of Bigfoot! Bigfoot doesn't exist, but something else does...

Bigface Marsh is a survival horror game where you have to collect footage of Bigface!

CONTROLS:

WASD = Movement

Mouse  = Look Around

F = Camera On/Off

R = Reload Batteries (if cam is off) / Record Footage (if cam is on)

LMB = Interact

RMB = Drop Items / Secondary Interact

Q = Lean Left

E = Lean Right

Space Bar = Look Over Shoulder

Keep an eye and ear out for secrets! This game features three endings, a hidden game mode and a few easter eggs!
